This page is using the main layout!

Hello Jekyll Sort Test!



In my _config.yml I put:
numbers: [3,1,4,5,2]
people:
  - name: Dave
    age: 22

  - name: Bob
    age: 20

  - name: Mark
    age: 17

  - name: Alex
    age: 21

  - name: Chris
    age: 19

jekyll_sort:
  - src: numbers
    direction: up
    dest: numbers_sorted

  - src: people
    by: name
    direction: up
    dest: people_sorted_by_name

  - src: people
    by: age
    direction: down
    dest: people_sorted_by_age_desc


Here is {{ site.numbers }}

31452

here is {{ site.numbers_sorted }}

12345

here is {{ site.people }}

{"name"=>"Dave", "age"=>22}{"name"=>"Bob", "age"=>20}{"name"=>"Mark", "age"=>17}{"name"=>"Alex", "age"=>21}{"name"=>"Chris", "age"=>19}

here is {{ site.people_sorted_by_name }}

{"name"=>"Alex", "age"=>21}{"name"=>"Bob", "age"=>20}{"name"=>"Chris", "age"=>19}{"name"=>"Dave", "age"=>22}{"name"=>"Mark", "age"=>17}

here is {{ site.people_sorted_by_age_desc }}

{"name"=>"Dave", "age"=>22}{"name"=>"Alex", "age"=>21}{"name"=>"Bob", "age"=>20}{"name"=>"Chris", "age"=>19}{"name"=>"Mark", "age"=>17}

Here is the site var:
